i1.name: Second Skin
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attacks deal {{as|{{pp|4 to 10 for 7|1;3;6;9;11;14;17}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|changedisplay=true|1 to 5 for 5|1;4 to 16}} per Plasma stack)|buzzword}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|type=Plasma stacks|changedisplay=true|10 to 20 for 5|0 to 4}} AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Caustic Wounds:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}}, as well as her and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects and {{tip|polymorph|polymorphs}}, mark enemies with {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} for 4 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to 4 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. '''Kai'Sa's''' attacks or {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} against enemies with {{as|4 Plasma|buzzword}} rupture them, consuming them to deal {{as|15% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's {{sti|'''missing''' health}}|health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 400 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Living Weapon:}} Upon gaining a set amount of permanent [[Champion statistic|stats]] from [[item]]s and {{tt|stat growth|Includes all stats gained when leveling (including base AD gained), but does not include stats at level 1.}}, '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve the related [[champion ability|basic ability]] after being in [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kai'Sa's basic attacks deal 1;3;6;9;11;14;17 ‒ undefined (+ 1;4 to 16 ‒ undefined per Plasma stack) (+ 0 to 4 ‒ undefined AP) bonus magic damage.
Innate - Caustic Wounds: Kai'Sa's basic attacks and Void Seeker, as well as her and nearby allies' immobilizing effects and polymorphs, mark enemies with Plasma for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. Kai'Sa's attacks or Void Seeker against enemies with 4 Plasma rupture them, consuming them to deal 15% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, capped at 400 against monsters.
Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent Champion statistic from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related champion ability after being in Channel#Casting Times for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
i1.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' receives the evolution even if she dies while in cast time.
* '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve an ability even if she hasn't learned it yet.
* '''Kai'Sa''' and allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects '''cannot''' rupture the {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
* {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} which exceeds the 5th stack is applied normally.
* Stats from runes do not count toward the minimum requirement to upgrade a [[champion ability|basic ability]].
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} application from {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} only.

q1.name: Icathian Rain
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemies, each one hitting their target after {{fd|0.4}} seconds and dealing {{as|physical damage}}. {{tip|Minions}} below {{sti|health|{{as|35% health}}}} take double damage.
Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{sti|{{as|{{pp|round=ceil|100-{{ccd|Kai'Sa|dam_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} attack damage}}}} from [[items]] to upgrade – ''Icathian Rain'' instead fires 12 missiles.
''A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby visible enemies, each one hitting their target after 0.4 seconds and dealing physical damage. Minions below 35% health take double damage.
Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.
Living Weapon: Requires 100-Unknown value: ccd Kai'Sa dam_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))undefined − (based on level) attack damage from items to upgrade – Icathian Rain instead fires 12 missiles.
A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Missile|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The first missile on a target applies {{tip|area damage}}, while the rest on the same target apply {{tip|persistent area damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} only block the damage from a single missile.
* ''Icathian Rain'' acquires its targets upon cast. Moving will not change its targets.
* Charging {{ai|Supercharge|Kai'Sa}} will not stop the missiles from firing.
* It takes 1 second for all missiles to fire at a single target.

effects.str: • Physical Damage Per Missile: (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)

• Reduced Damage Per Missile: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)
  • Total Single-Target Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)
• Total Evolved Single-Target Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % AP)

w1.name: Void Seeker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' fires a void blast in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings as it travels and stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds and applying {{as|2 Plasma|buzzword}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{sti|{{as|100 ability power}}}} from [[items]] to upgrade – ''Void Seeker'' applies {{as|3 Plasma|buzzword}} instead and refunds 70% of its {{sti|cooldown}} if it hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa fires a void blast in the target direction, granting sight of its surroundings as it travels and stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage, revealing them for 4 seconds and applying 2 Plasma.
Living Weapon: Requires 100 ability power from items to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma instead and refunds 70% of its cooldown if it hits an enemy champion.
w1.notes:
* If the stacks detonate {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}, any remaining stacks are reapplied afterwards.
* ''Void Seeker'' also deals ''Second Skin's'' damage based on {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} stacks on the target.
** This increases ''Void Seeker's'' damage by ''Second Skin's'' base damage per level, plus at least {{as|{{fd|22.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|10%|0 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|12.5}}%|1 stack Plasma AP ratio}}) if the target was hit while at 0 stacks, and up to {{as|{{fd|37.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|{{fd|17.5}}%|3 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|20%|4 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}) if the target was hit at 3 stacks.
** When evolved, the AP ratio increases by at least {{as|{{fd|37.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|10%|0 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|12.5}}%|1 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|15%|2 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}), and up to {{as|{{fd|52.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|15%|2 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|17.5}}%|3 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|20%|4 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}).
* ''Void Seeker'' is cast from wherever '''Kai'Sa''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 130% AD) (+ 70% AP)

e1.name: Supercharge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' charges for the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''bonus''' attack speed|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed.}}|as}}.
After charging up, '''Kai'Sa''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and her {{tip|attack windup|basic attack windup}} percentage is reduced to {{fd|6.44%}} for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{sti|as|{{as|{{pp|round=ceil|key=%|100-{{ccd|Kai'Sa|as_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} attack speed}}}} from [[items]] to upgrade – ''Supercharge'' grants {{tip|invisibility}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa charges for the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes ghosted and gains bonus movement speed, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
After charging up, Kai'Sa gains bonus attack speed and her basic attack windup percentage is reduced to 6.44% for 4 seconds.
Supercharge's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds on-attack.
Living Weapon: Requires 100-Unknown value: ccd Kai'Sa as_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))% − undefined% (based on level) attack speed from items to upgrade – Supercharge grants invisibility for 0.5 seconds.
e1.notes:
* Her attack commands during this time are switched to movement commands instead. Upon finishing the charge and if an attack command was issued, '''Kai'Sa''' will continue walking toward her target.
** '''Kai'Sa''' behaves normally if attack move click was issued not on a target during the cast time, stopping at attack range of the closest target and starts attacking when charged up.

effects.str:
• Minimum Movement Speed: %
  • Maximum Movement Speed: %

r1.name: Killer Instinct
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' instantly {{tip|shields}} herself for 2 seconds and swiftly {{tip|dashes}} to a target location near a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion {{tt|recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}|4 seconds after it's stacked or ruptured}}. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.
''Killer Instinct'' {{tip|Basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attack timer.
'''Kai'Sa''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Killer Instinct''.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kai'Sa instantly shields herself for 2 seconds and swiftly dashes to a target location near a visible enemy champion recently affected by Plasma. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.
Killer Instinct resets Kai'Sa's basic attack timer.
Kai'Sa can cast any of her abilities during Killer Instinct.
r1.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' will issue a movement command to the targeted location regardless of whether the target location is valid. The dash is not buffered during this movement command. '''Kai'Sa''' will not dash if the targeted location becomes valid by walking in range or a nearby enemy champion becomes affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
** If the targeted location is not valid, the range indicator will glow.
* The enemy champion recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} must be in range of '''Kai'Sa''' for the targeted location to be valid, and not the targeted location itself.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ % AD) (+ 75% AP)
